到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the link between science fiction and philosophy.
Students will be able to discuss popular philosophy.
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This course looks at the relationship between popular philosophy (not academic philosophy) and science fiction. Students will look at examples of science fiction genres and how these genres discuss philosophy.

第13回: Case Study 4 - The Matrix: are we in a simulation?
